original_text:
When David heard that Nabal was dead, he said, “Praise be to the Lord, who has upheld my cause against Nabal for treating me with contempt. He has kept his servant from doing wrong and has brought Nabal’s wrongdoing down on his own head.”
Then David sent word to Abigail, asking her to become his wife.
korean_text: 나발이 죽었다 함을 다윗이 듣고 이르되 나발에게 당한 나의 모욕을 갚아 주사 종으로 악한 일을 하지 않게 하신 여호와를 찬송할지로다 여호와께서 나발의 악행을 그의 머리에 돌리셨도다 하니라 다윗이 아비가일을 자기 아내로 삼으려고 사람을 보내어 그에게 말하게 하매

sentences.original_text: When David heard that Nabal was dead
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 나발이 죽었다는 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: who has upheld my cause against Nabal
sentences.korean_translation: 나발에게 맞서 나의 사정을 지켜주신 주께서

sentences.original_text: He has kept his servant from doing wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 종이 악을 행치 않게 하셨고

sentences.original_text: and has brought Nabal's wrongdoing down on his own head
Then David sent word to Abigail
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 다윗은 아비가일에게 소식을 보내

sentences.original_text: asking her to become his wife
